help
displays a list of commands
ls -book
displays a list of books
goto [x]
renders page x, add '-false' flag to skip animation
load [path]
loads a specfic book at [path] relative to index.html into memory
roll [n]d[x] +y
rolls an x sided die n times and adds y to the result
setspeed [x]
sets the typing speed in ms
setfont [name]
sets the default font to [name] if possible, case-sensitive
reload
reloads the application
cls
clears screen and stops prints, does not reload page
